question: In which of the following pairs, both the elements do not have (n-1)d10 ns2 configuration?
explanation: Zn, Cd, and Hg are group 12 elements with (n-1)d10 ns2 configuration.
Cu is 3d10 4s1. Ag is 4d10 5s1. Therefore, the pair Ag, Cu does not possess the (n-1)d10 ns2 configuration [cite: 582-595].
